sound

Class TrackPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sound.TrackPlayer

  • public class TrackPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Plays the sound files created by SoundUpload.
    Since:
    1.0 Original version created by Megan and Brian
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Megan Knez, Brian Nakayama
    See Also:
    SoundUpload
